resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many agents of the current user's organization

options.name: Get Output
options.description: Get the output of the most recent container of an agent
options.action: Get the output of an agent

options.name: Launch
options.description: Add an agent to the launch queue
options.action: Add an agent to the launch queue

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

agentId.name: agentId
agentId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
agentId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the launch just include the container ID. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: argumentsJson
options.description: Agent argument. Can either be a JSON string or a plain object. The argument can be retrieved with buster.argument in the agent’s script.

values.name: key
values.description: Name of the argument key to add

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set for the argument key

values.name: key
values.description: Name of the argument key to add

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set for the argument key

options.name: bonusArgumentJson
options.description: Agent bonus argument. Can either be a JSON string or a plain object. This bonus argument is single-use, it will only be used for the current launch. If present, it will be merged with the original argument, resulting in an effective argument that can be retrieved with buster.argument in the agent’s script.

options.name: manualLaunch
options.description: Whether the agent will be considered as "launched manually"

options.name: maxInstanceCount
options.description: If set, the agent will only be launched if the number of already running instances is below the specified number

options.name: saveArgument
options.description: If true, argument will be saved as the default launch options for the agent

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'agentId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'agentId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'agent' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getOutput' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'agentId'
IF operation == 'getOutput' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveData'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'getOutput' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'launch' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'agentId'
IF operation == 'launch' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveData'
IF operation == 'launch' AND resource == 'agent' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'agent' AND operation == 'launch' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
